title: Xayah and Rakan's skins should be changed from "Dusk and Dawn" to "Moon and Sun"
body: Xayah literally throws moons instead of feathers in her Cosmic Dusk skin. Would it not be better that the skin was actually based off the name of the skin? Also the Rakan skin needs some touch ups as most would agree because it looks pathetic in comparison to the other skins that are being released with it. Here you would have the opportunity to make it more focused on light also leading it to go better hand in hand with the name "Cosmic Sun Rakan".

replies.body:
We did toss around the idea of Cosmic Sun and Cosmic Moon, but they aren't Pokémon games, so we opted for something a bit more creative and went with Cosmic Dusk and Cosmic Dawn. 

*Seriously, though, we didn't feel that the names sounded as strong, and were a bit too 'to the point'.*
